net.sourceforge.nite.gui.timelineviewer
Interface ElementToLayerDepthDelegate

public interface ElementToLayerDepthDelegate

ElementToLayerDepthDelegate is used by NiteTimeline to determine which sub-layer to place an element on. This interface is provided for authors to create their own rules.

Author:
Craig Nicol

Method Summary

Parameters:
element -
Returns:
the depth of element in the current layer, or 0 to suppress display
